name: Shackles
description:
Welcome to Shackles! Shackles is a rage game where you must guide a little alien known as a Gnibut away from its prey. It is the last of its species and must be protected at all costs!

Thanks to VOiD1 Gaming - itch.io and Peritune for music and thanks to Giraffe_Boi and Blizz for art!!
